# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug1679.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug1679.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug510.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug510.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vsin.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vsin.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug1679.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> bug1679.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug1679.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug1679.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug1679.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug1679.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug1679.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VSIN/bug1679.cir.prn bug1679.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug1679.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug1679.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/vsin.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> vsin.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/vsin.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/vsin.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vsin.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/vsin.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} vsin.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VSIN/vsin.cir.prn vsin.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/vsin.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vsin.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug510.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> bug510.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug510.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug510.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug510.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug510.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug510.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VSIN/bug510.cir.prn bug510.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VSIN/bug510.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug510.cir)
endif()
